channel.title: WooCommerce Page Builder
channel.description: A plugin that allows for a free form layout of WooCommerce Page builder with Visual Composer

item.title: My Account
item.dc:creator: data_sample
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tour active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Dashboard" tab_id="1472319573324-28c5334f-9036"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_dashboard desc="I am a custom my account dashboard. Tell to your users what you say here!"]I am a custom my account dashboard. Tell to your users what you say here! - View your recent orders, manage your shipping and billing addressesand edit your password and account details... in tab. - Easy to custom. - provides a full set of easy-to-use WooCommerce shortcode - ...[/dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_dashboard][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Orders - Order Details" tab_id="1472319573394-c14b86e9-9895"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_orders][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Downloads" tab_id="1472319696538-8935bae1-bfa7"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_downloads][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Account Addresses" tab_id="1472319718017-86589ee2-c6fe"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_addresses][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Account Details" tab_id="1472319833478-30ee815d-bd9e"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_edit_account][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Logout" tab_id="1472320014528-50cfe1e4-b330"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_logout][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tour][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Custom MyAccount Before Login
item.dc:creator: data_sample
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1474147047079{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]My Account Before Login You can custom the My Account page before customers login. For example, you’d like to add one line of text with instructions on how to create an account, etc... I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo. - Have an Account? click Login tab below to login: Login - Have not yet an Account? click Register tab below to register: Register And following these steps below....[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-lock" title="Login" tab_id="1474145610338-88ecd92d-bfc3" add_icon="true"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_form_login][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_icon_fontawesome="fa fa-user" title="Register" tab_id="1474145610426-ab942735-0aef" add_icon="true"][dtwpb_woocommerce_myaccount_form_register][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This template build with Visual Composer page builder

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Custom Product Category Page Template
item.dc:creator: data_sample
item.content:encoded: [vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" video_bg="yes" video_bg_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zotKfJ-FyRo" video_bg_parallax="content-moving" enable_overlay="enable_overlay_value" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_pattern="transperant" overlay_pattern_opacity="100" css=".vc_custom_1505149035280{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}" el_class="custom-category-page-header"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="This page Build with WooCommerce Page Builder" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:45|text_align:center|color:%23ebebeb" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="bounceInUp"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3"][dtwpb_product_category_header][dtwpb_woocommerce_shop_loop columns="4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="This is a custom Sidebar"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="primary"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
